greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square of permutation defined by A003188.
comment: Inverse of sequence A064707 considered as a permutation of the nonnegative integers.
Not the same as A100282: a(n) = A100282(n) = A100280(A100280(n)) only for n < 64. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 11 2004
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(n) = n XOR floor(n/4), where XOR is binary exclusive OR. - _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 25 2004
program: (MATLAB) A = 1; for i = 1:7 B = A(end:-1:1); A = [A (B + length(A))]; end A(A) - 1
(PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, write("b064706.txt", n, " ", bitxor(n, n\4)) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Sep 22 2009
for(n in 4:maxn) b[n] <- b[n-1] - b[n-2] + b[n-3]
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 13 2001
